headline: The Hershey Company (HSY): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on The Hershey Company on Value investing subreddit by raytoei. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HSY. The Hershey Company’s share was trading at $185.08 as of December 1st. HSY’s trailing and forward P/E were 27.67 and 27.70 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Hershey’s stock performance offers a […]
